Header.description: UM TORNEIO EM OSU!LAZER DE RANK ABERTO

Descriptions.mappool: Uma modpool de lazer, com novos mods a cada semana.
Descriptions.format: Um torneio 3v3, rank aberto, de eliminação dupla.
Descriptions.schedule: Assista à transmissão de partidas futuras na Twitch.

Originals.title: Originais
Originals.subtitle: MÚSICAS ORIGINAIS LANÇADAS EM BREVE.
Originals.description: Avance pelas fases para desbloquear originais do TEST exclusivos. Criadores talentosos compuseram músicas originais que são progressivamente reveladas com os estágios de qualificação, semifinals, finals e grand finals. Com cada música original apresentando estilo e arte únicos, estes beatmaps estão reservados para os melhores competidores deste torneio.

Footer.description: UM TORNEIO EM OSU!LAZER DE RANK ABERTO ORGANIZADO POR TEDDY, ENTROPY, E SORA.

Metadata.description: Osu!'s first large scale open rank lazer tournament. Welcome to the new osu! tournament experience.

GeneralInfo.1: TEST Open é um torneio de osu! que acontecerá exclusivamente no cliente do **[osu! Lazer](https://osu.ppy.sh/wiki/en/Help_centre/Upgrading_to_lazer)**.
GeneralInfo.2: As equipes serão compostas por **3-5 membros**.
GeneralInfo.3: As equipes deverão escolher exatamente **3 jogadores** para cada mapa jogado no torneio.
GeneralInfo.4: Não há **nenhum requerimento para o rank** dos participantes.
GeneralInfo.5: Todas as respectivas equipes devem jogar as qualificatórias no fim de semana listado.
GeneralInfo.6: The top **32 teams** from qualifiers will continue into a **Double Elimination** bracket.
GeneralInfo.7: All players must be in the **[Discord Server](https://discord.com/invite/nZnQZMvEhq)** and set their nickname to their **osu! username**.
GeneralInfo.8: Times will be listed in **UTC-0** and **Discord Local Time**.
GeneralInfo.9: Staff members that hold any role other than the following may not participate in the tournament: {sublist_alpha} Streaming {sublist_alpha} Commentary {sublist_alpha} Design {sublist_alpha} Translation
GeneralInfo.heading: GENERAL INFO.

Registrations.1: You must sign up for the website with both your **osu!** and **Discord account**.
Registrations.2: Team creation and management will be done through the **[TEST Open Website](https://test-open.com)**.
Registrations.3: To create a **free agent post**, go to the **discord server** and locate the looking-for-team channel. In there you are able to create a post through the **TEST Bot**.
Registrations.4: If the website is down then you may ask an admin for a **registration form**. However, if you opt to sign-up through this method then your info will be seen on the sheet but not the website until it is manually updated.
Registrations.5: The staff team will not be creating **free agent teams**. So if you wish to participate, you must find yourself a team.
Registrations.heading: REGISTROS.

GeneralConduct.1: Respect other players and all staff members.
GeneralConduct.2: No **discriminatory terms**. Including but not limited to: {sublist_alpha} Racial Slurs {sublist_alpha} Terms that may be offensive to LGBTQ+ members {sublist_alpha} Sexist comments {sublist_alpha} Hate Speech
GeneralConduct.3: TEST Open has no tolerance for bullying of any kind.
GeneralConduct.4: **NSFW content** is prohibited. This includes: {sublist_alpha} Nudity {sublist_alpha} Gore/Violent Content {sublist_alpha} Drug/Alcohol Abuse {sublist_alpha} Disturbing Content
GeneralConduct.5: Try to keep **controversial conversations** to a minimum.
GeneralConduct.7: **Doxing is not allowed** under any circumstances.
GeneralConduct.8: No content that is banned under **Discord TOS** is allowed.
GeneralConduct.9: **English is the primary language of the tournament**, so keep this in mind when communicating with staff.
GeneralConduct.10: If you see somebody breaking any of these rules, please contact a **Moderator or Admin** to get it resolved.
GeneralConduct.11: Lastly, just use **common sense** and create a **welcoming environment** for everyone!
GeneralConduct.heading: CONDUTAS GERAIS.

Scheduling.1: Matches will be scheduled through the **TEST Bot** in the Discord Server.
Scheduling.2: For scheduling or rescheduling a qualifier lobby, please use the **/schedule** command and enter the prompted information.
Scheduling.3: For rescheduling a match, please use the **/reschedule** command and enter the prompted information. This will send a reschedule request in the scheduling channel.
Scheduling.4: When rescheduling a match **both team captains will have to click accept** on the reschedule request in the scheduling channel in order for the reschedule to complete.
Scheduling.heading: PROGRAMAÇÃO.

GameProcedures.1: All maps will be scored with **osu! Lazer default scoring**.
GameProcedures.3: Referees will contact the Captains of any participating team for each game. {sublist_alpha} Captains are responsible for relaying any information given by the referee to their team. {sublist_alpha} A reminder will be sent out **25 minutes** before each game. {sublist_alpha} Lazer room name and password will be sent out **15 minutes** before each game.
GameProcedures.4: After a map has been selected, participating players have **2 minutes** to join the lobby.
GameProcedures.heading: GAME PROCEDURES.

Qualifiers.1: Maps will be played in the same order as seen on the mappool.
Qualifiers.2: If a player **disconnects** **within the first minute of a map**, the player will replay the map at the **end of the qualifier room**.
Qualifiers.3: Teams are expected to have 3 players in the room within **5 minutes after their room start time**. If a team fails to show up then the team will have to reschedule their room. This room must be at least **4 hours** after the room they failed to show up to.
Qualifiers.heading: QUALIFICATÓRIAS

Match.1: The win-condition for each match will be **TeamVS**.
Match.2: Warmups, Protects, Bans, and Picks must be submitted within **2 minutes**.
Match.3: Teams are expected to have 3 players in the room within **5 minutes after their match start time**. They will forfeit the following at each timestamp. {sublist_alpha} 5 minutes late is forfeit of protects. {sublist_alpha} 10 minutes late is forfeit of bans. {sublist_alpha} 15 minutes late is a forfeit of match.
Match.4: Players must be in a lobby slot corresponding to their team. {sublist_alpha} Team 1 (Red): Slots 1, 2, and 3. {sublist_alpha} Team 2 (Blue): Slots 4, 5, and 6.
Match.5: Captains will use the **!roll command in the Discord thread** of their match to decide **Pick/Ban order**. The captain with the higher roll may select one of the following, while the other captain will receive the other: {sublist_alpha} First to Pick and Second to Ban {sublist_alpha} Second to Pick and First to Ban
Match.6: Teams may opt into playing 1 map of their choice as a warmup before the match. {sublist_alpha} Warmups must be **less than 4 minutes long**. {sublist_alpha} Warmups may **not be part of the mappool**.
Match.7: Protects will be **privately submitted** to the referee before the banning phase.
Match.8: Banning phase will be done in a **snake format** (ABBA). {sublist_alpha} Team 1 Bans {sublist_alpha} Team 2 Bans twice {sublist_alpha} Team 1 Bans
Match.9: Once the ban and protect phase has ended, **any bans on a protected map will be voided** and that map will be playable as normal.
Match.10: Banning from the **same modpool twice in a row is prohibited** excluding the **No-Mod pool**.
Match.11: Picking from the **same modpool twice in a row is prohibited** excluding the **Lazer-Mod** and **No-Mod pools**.
Match.12: Players may play Tiebreaker with any mod that is **not a global rate change mod**.
Match.13: Each team has **one 5-minute timeout** which may be used at any point in the match.
Match.14: If a player **disconnects within the first minute of a map**, the map will be **aborted** and the team has **5 minutes** to field another player to play the map. This may only occur once per team and per match.
Match.heading: MATCH

MappoolInfo.1: The mappool will be released the **Sunday** of every week.
MappoolInfo.2: Lazer Mod, or LM for short, is a modpool that will feature different mods every week to showcase the new mods the Lazer client has to offer.
MappoolInfo.heading: MAPPOOL INFO.

PrizePool.1: The MVP of the tournament {sublist_alpha} **Customized WLmouse Beast X mini mouse** designed by Spoo and painted by Dovacustoms. The custom mouse will also include the player's name painted on the top.
PrizePool.2: First Place {sublist_alpha} $500 split between the players {sublist_alpha} **Customized TEST Open Tablet Cover** designed by Spoo and produced by Bluebunny {sublist_alpha} Animated Team Banner
PrizePool.3: Second Place {sublist_alpha} $200 split between the players {sublist_alpha} Static Team Banner
PrizePool.4: Third Place {sublist_alpha} $100 split between the players {sublist_alpha} Static Team Banner
PrizePool.heading: PRIZE POOL.

Errors.missingCode: Sorry, but the sign in couldn't be completed. If unexpected please try again otherwise feel free to navigate back home.
